title: kAru vElpulu
sahitya:
kAru vElpulu nIku sarikAru



anupallavi



 kAruku jilakara sambA kantara mainaTTu gAni



caraNam 1



 divatiki dIpamu rIti kAvETiki kAluvala rIti gAni



caraNam 2



 tamma vairiki tArakala rIti kamma viltuniki kAnti narula rIti gAni



caraNam 3



 sAgaramunaku sarasu rIti tyAgarAjavinuta dharalO nIku sari
